snippet: Two former executives of NantHealth said that the company made fraudulent claims about the reliability of its system, and may have used company donations to attract federal funds so a hospital could buy its products.
abstract: Former NantHealth executives Stephanie Davidson and William Lynch file lawsuit against the health technology firm alleging that it made false claims about the reliability of some of its system; accusations are part of wrongful-termination suit.
lead_paragraph: Two former executives of NantHealth said that the company made fraudulent claims about the reliability of its system, and may have used company donations to attract federal funds so a hospital could buy its products.

headline.main: Ex-Employees Accuse Health Firm of Fraud
headline.print_headline: Ex-Employees Accuse Health Firm of Fraud
